pkgmetadata.longdescription: Negative Binomial Mixed Models Using Large-Sample Approximation for Differential Expression Analysis of ScRNA-Seq Data // A fast negative binomial mixed model for conducting association analysis of multi-subject single-cell data. It can be used for identifying marker genes, differential expression and co- expression analyses. The model includes subject-level random effects to account for the hierarchical structure in multi- subject single-cell data. See He et al. (2021) doi:10.1038/s42003-021-02146-6.
